titleStmt.title: The antient and present state of Muscovy containing a geographical, historical, and political account of all those nations and territories under the jurisdiction of the present czar : with sculptures and a new map / by J.C., M.D., Fellow of the Royal Society, and a member of the College of Physicians, London.
titleStmt.author: Crull, J. (Jodocus), d. 1713?

biblFull.extent: 2 v. ([14], 342, [2] p., 392 [i.e. 239], [1] p., 2 folded leaves of plates) : ill., 1 folded map, ports.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for A. Roper ... and A. Bosvile ...,

notesStmt.note: Errata: p. [13] at beginning of vol. 1.
